4309540.name: Skinwalker Forest
4309540.description:
Skinwalker Forest is a horror riddle game on attention and memmory.

You are moving though the long corridors of the maze made from the forest trees. Use the map to locate yourself and try to escape by going to the exit located on the north and marked by the star.

Escape the Creatures by outsmarting them. Each creature has some kind of corruption that hints you actions you need to perform to escape. Be carefull, if you hesitate or make a mistake creature will attack you decreasing your health.

Read the Stone runes to understand the rules of this place and to know what actions do you need to perform to escape creatures.

Meet heplers, seem to be friendly creatures that can heal you. But be carefull, some of them aare not so friendly and will attack you instead if you accept their offer.
